00087 {
00088 #ifdef CPU_ADUC812
00089    ADCCON1 = 0x7C;              // power up ADC, 14.5us conv+acq time
00090    ADCCON2 = 0;                 // select channel to convert
00091    DACCON = 0x1f;               // power on DACs
00092 #endif
00093 
00094 #ifdef CPU_C8051F000
00095    AMX0CF = 0x00;               // select single ended analog inputs
00096    ADC0CF = 0xE0;               // 16 system clocks, gain 1
00097    ADC0CN = 0x80;               // enable ADC 
00098 
00099    REF0CN = 0x03;               // enable internal reference
00100    DAC0CN = 0x80;               // enable DAC0
00101    DAC1CN = 0x80;               // enable DAC1
00102 #endif

00104    /* correct initial EEPROM value */
00105    if (user_conf.adc_average == 0xFF)
00106       user_conf.adc_average = 0;
